author: Will Knight
title: A Rush Back to 'Normal' Would Be the Blunder of the Century
description: Former Treasury Secretary Larry Summers warns that trying to restart the US economy too soon would put countless lives in danger and risk far more economic damage.
content: Larry Summers knows a thing or two about economic emergencies. As US Treasury Secretary under President Clinton in the 1990s, he led the countrys response to financial crises arising in Mexico, Brazil, Russia, and Asia. And as economic adviser to President Ob… [+5147 chars]
